name: via contract
description:
This is 'via contract', a new video game from Outhouse Media. The lead character is a woman named Lexie, voiced by Cate Blanchett, and she is currently playing a "constant role" as the voice of Travis.
In the video, Travis is a "secret operative" in the organization, working alongside a female friend who finds her "most important skills and abilities". At the beginning of the video, Travis mentions, "The only thing you have to know is what you do, and you'll be the boss". Travis's best friend, Genth, is a 14 year old "fringe character" who may have suffered from "a horrible trauma". Genth is part of Travis's "secret identity", and is in "proper contact" with "The Boss" via Facebook (although this is yet to be confirmed). It's likely the two are dating, and possibly conceive of a child together. Her father's secret identity is also revealed. Travis and Genth are described as "lost boys", who, despite having a "highly successful career", are "misfits" because they have "no money, no friends, no mother (and two pups, two more kitties, and a house cat". There are images of three sons: Travis (front-right), Neeo (front-left), and Cons. The names and description of the "fringe" is vague, with Genth described as autistic, and Travis described as "sexless" and
